verbLexeme: 1. To be very bad and enjoy doing things that harm other people. English = (be) evil.
2. Of children, to be eager to have fun or be naughty, especially be embarrassing people or by playing tricks. English = (be) mischievous.
nominalLexeme: 1. In Christianity, the most powerful evil spirit. English = devil, Satan
oldEntry: Popular explanation: the horns of the devil.
